description: Main entry point for a Flutter application implementing an attendance tracker. Sets up app initialization, theme, navigation, and state management with Provider.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app, manages the main navigation state.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyApp.

classes.name: _MyAppState
classes.description: State object for MyApp, handling index of selected tab and building the widget tree.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp with navigation and tab structure.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes Flutter binding and environment variables, then runs the app.
